name: Melffy Staring Contest
text: You can reveal 1 Beast monster in your hand; add 1 "Melffy" monster with a different name from your Deck or GY to your hand, and if you do, place the revealed monster on the bottom of the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Melffy Staring Contest" once per turn. At the start of your opponent's Battle Phase: You can reveal any number of "Melffy" monsters in your hand and keep them revealed during the Battle Phase. Monsters your opponent controls lose ATK equal to the combined ATK and DEF of all monsters being revealed by this effect.
